ComicInfo.Summary:
Spawn infiltrates a building, which is supposed to be guarding an important file. Once spawn actually finds this file, he learns that it is just a file on his former best friend Terry Fitzgerald.
Meanwhile Jason Wynn has just been returned to earth after his two days of being a Redeemer. This unfortunately raised a lot of questions around the C.I.A. office.
However, whatever kind of persicution Jason is suffering from, Terry has it ten times worse. Now both the C.I.A. and the Mob (They think he's spawn) want him dead.
After a brief accident occurs with two C.I.A agents, Terry flees, eventually ending up trapped in the alley. Unfortunately for Terry, there's another pressence in the alley . . . and it aint exactly the most peaceful one.
ComicInfo.Teams: Federal Bureau of Investigation,Central Intelligence Agency,Hellspawn
ComicInfo.Title: The Hunt Part 2
